scripts.compile-bct: browserify BasicColorTerminal.js -o bct-bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t uglifyify
scripts.compile-bct-hsl: browserify BasicColorTerminalHsl.js -o bcthsl-bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t uglifyify
scripts.compile-bct-lab: browserify BasicColorTerminalLab.js -o bctlab-bundle.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t uglifyify
